name: fractionally
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
by a very small amount: Despite substantial price cuts, sales have increased only fractionally. Temperatures in summer are fractionally higher. See
fractional
More examplesFewer examplesShe turned her head fractionally toward the noise.The jobless rate dropped fractionally in June. She lowered her voice only fractionally.
